pageContent: Objectives: To report experience with focal brachytherapy (FB) and compare its clinical outcomes with those of radical prostatectomy (RP) in localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
In search of the correlation between nanomechanical and biomolecular properties of prostate cancer cells with different metastatic potential
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33296690/
